definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: I just emphasized different elements in a way to manipulate your intuitions.
sentences.chinese: 我只是強調了不同的要素來操縱你們的直覺。

sentences.english: If this is love; is not fair.
sentences.chinese: 要是這就是愛情，素來就不平允。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation has always been ceremonies, reciprocity has become habit.
sentences.chinese: 中華民族素來是禮儀之邦，禮尚往來早已成爲習慣。

sentences.english: But I also recommend adding additional motivators, to help jump start you.
sentences.chinese: 我也推薦額外的激勵因素來幫助你重新開始。

sentences.english: Now I had not been beforetime sad in his presence.
sentences.chinese: 我素來在王面前沒有愁容。

sentences.english: Now Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌素來愛馬大，和他妹子，並拉撒路。

sentences.english: I was put on testosterone injections to induce puberty – to help turn me into a man.
sentences.chinese: 醫生通過對我注射睾丸素來誘導使我發育爲一個男性。

sentences.english: At just the right moment you add rennet, which congeals the curds .
sentences.chinese: 然後在正確的時間加入凝乳酵素來凝結酸化的牛乳。

sentences.english: The disparity cannot be explained by any apparent biological factors.
sentences.chinese: 這不一致不能用任何表面生物因素來解釋。

sentences.english: 2in you I trust, O my God.
sentences.chinese: 我的神阿，我素來倚靠你。

sentences.english: This implies that architects cannot be driven solely by technical considerations.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着架構師不能只由技術因素來驅動。
我素來沒說過任何人的壞話。

sentences.english: Lots of plants produce powerful toxins to deter pests.
sentences.chinese: 許多的植物會生產威力巨大的毒素來防止害蟲。

sentences.english: I have taken glucosamine & chondroitin daily for several years for arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 幾年來一直服用葡萄糖胺&軟骨素來對關節炎。

sentences.english: You can then double-click each element to create it.
sentences.chinese: 然後您可以雙擊每個元素來創建它。

sentences.english: People never know to get away from them gracefully .
sentences.chinese: 人們素來不知道怎樣從從容容地離去。
